name: @bingsjs/word

scripts.clean: rm -fr build; rm -fr tests/package/node_modules; rm -fr tests/package/package-lock.json; npm unlink -g $npm_package_name;
scripts.?cov: run unit tests, collect code coverage and generate reports
scripts.?cz: Git commit using Commitizen to enforce standard commit messages
scripts.?watch:test: Watch file changes and run related tests
scripts.doc:html: rm -fr build/docs; markdown-folder-to-html; mv _docs build/docs; typedoc --options config/typedoc.json src/ && depcruise --config config/.dependency-cruiser.js src --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > build/docs/api/dependencygraph.svg
scripts.?todo: search for any todo items (marked with 'TODO') in project files
scripts.?packlink: pack the package, extract it under /build/pack, then npm link from there
scripts.packlink: pinst --disable; rm -fr build/pack; FILENAME=`npm pack 2>&1|tail -n -1`; echo; echo PACKAGED: `ls $FILENAME -s -h`; mkdir -p build/pack; cd build/pack; tar -xzf ../../$FILENAME; cd package; npm link; cd ../../..; rm $FILENAME; pinst --enable
scripts.?packagetest: use npm link to install the packed package, then run tests under tests/package
scripts.packagetest: cd tests/package; npm install; npm link $npm_package_name; cd ../..; jest -c config/jest.config.package.js
scripts.?release: do a release dry-run when not invoked with --execute, otherwise do a release
